assessment_criteria.name: Organisational plans and policies for ethical labour practices
assessment_criteria.description: The project team organisations (client, design team, principal contractor) each have corporate plans and policies regarding ethical labour practices.

assessment_criteria.name: Application of ethical labour plans and policies to the project
assessment_criteria.description: The selection process for (i) the design team, (ii) the principal contractor, and (iii) sub-contractor(s) included performance against their ethical labour plans and policies as one of the evaluation criteria.

sub_credits.role: The client's procurement of design team organisations
The client's procurement of the principal contractor
The principal contractor's procurement of sub-contractors

assessment_criteria.name: Monitoring ethical labour practices during construction
assessment_criteria.description: The principal contractor's plans and policies regarding ethical labour practices have been implemented and performance against them has been regularly monitored throughout the construction stage.

assessment_criteria.name: Independent verification or certification of ethical labour plans and policies
assessment_criteria.description: The project team organisations (client, design team, principal contractor) have each been verified or certified by an independent third party to a recognised ethical labour scheme.
